title: Syria Conflict & Trump Impeachment Comments
itunes:title: Syria Conflict & Trump Impeachment Comments
description:
Kevin spoke with Doug Heye, Republican Strategist, Former RNC Communications Director & Former Deputy Chief of Staff, Former House Majority Leader Eric Cantor and Joe Crowley, former New York Congressman and Democratic Caucus Chair. They discussed President Trump's use of the word "lynching" to describe the impeachment inquiry, President Trump's withdrawal of US troops from northern Syria, and the upcoming 2020 elections.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
